mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComOvseaDlvCstPlcLang Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN , LANG_CD , DLV_MTHD_DSCR , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM COM_OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_LANG WHERE 1 = 1 AND OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN = #{ovseaDlvCstPlcSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND LANG_CD = #{langCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
